why.title: Why MindEase?
why.subtitle: A new approach to mental wellness in Nepal.
why.problem.title: The Problem
why.problem.desc: Access to mental healthcare in Nepal is limited. Stigma, cost, and a shortage of professionals create significant barriers for those seeking support.
why.problem.point1: Limited access to professional mental health services
why.problem.point2: Social stigma surrounding mental health discussions
why.problem.point3: High cost of therapy and counseling
why.problemDesc: Millions in Nepal and beyond lack access to quality mental health support they deserve.
why.solution.title: Our Solution
why.solution.desc: MindEase combines human-centered design with AI to provide a private, affordable, and accessible tool. We offer a safe space for self-reflection and growth, available anytime, anywhere.
why.solutionDesc: AI-powered technology combined with human-centered design for accessible, affordable mental wellness.
why.trust.title: Trust and Privacy
why.trust.desc: We are not just another AI chatbot. MindEase is designed with a deep understanding of the Nepali context. Your conversations are private, and our anonymous mode ensures you can express yourself freely without fear of judgment.

about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.desc: MindEase was started by a team of technologists and mental health advocates from Nepal. We saw the urgent need for accessible mental wellness tools and decided to build a solution that is both culturally aware and technologically advanced.
about.team.title: Our Team
about.team.desc: We are a small, dedicated team of developers, designers, and mental health professionals. (Team member details can be added here).
about.ethical.title: An Ethical Note
about.ethical.desc: MindEase is a supportive tool, not a crisis line. If you are in immediate danger, please contact a local emergency service. We are committed to ethical AI and user privacy.
about.crisis: If you're in crisis, please contact Nepal Crisis Helpline: 1645 or your local emergency services.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about MindEase
faq.q1.question: Is MindEase free to use?
faq.q1.answer: Yes! MindEase offers a free tier with access to core features. Premium features are available for enhanced support.
faq.q2.question: Is my data private and secure?
faq.q2.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and never share your conversations. Your privacy is our top priority.
faq.q3.question: Can I use MindEase offline?
faq.q3.answer: Yes, MindEase works offline for many features. Your data syncs when you reconnect to the internet.
faq.q4.question: Is MindEase a replacement for therapy?
faq.q4.answer: No. MindEase is a supportive tool, not a replacement for professional mental health care. We always recommend consulting professionals for serious concerns.
faq.q5.question: What languages does MindEase support?
faq.q5.answer: MindEase currently supports English and Nepali, with plans to add more languages in the future.
faq.q6.question: How do I get started?
faq.q6.answer: Simply sign up with your email, create a profile, and start chatting. No credit card required for the free tier.
